alert.note: Alert for Conway; Northwest Yell County; Perry; Saline; Southern Pope County; Yell Excluding Northwest (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 7:49AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Perry, southern Conway, north central Saline, northeastern Yell and southeastern Pope Counties through 815 AM CDT... At 749 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Petit Jean River WMA, or 11 miles south of Russellville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Russellville... Morrilton... Perryville... Dardanelle... Pottsville... Ola... Oppelo... Perry... Adona... Houston... Sequoya Park... Carden Bottoms... Petit Jean State Park... Petit Jean River WMA... Galla Creek WMA... Mosley... Williams Junction... Mt Nebo State Park... Plumerville... Casa... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
